title: Strengthening Language Instructional Design Science Competencies Through Reflective Design Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational pedagogy and language education theories
context.additional_context: A systematic course for developing language education design competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers. Experiencing the design-implementation-evaluation-redesign cycle through VR simulations replicating real classroom scenarios.

learning_goals: A goal-oriented pattern-based design model can be used to systematically implement language instructional design.
Instructional activities designed in simulation/VR environments can be executed, and reflective assessments can be conducted based on learning data.
Instructional strategies can be improved to address diverse language learning outcomes by applying design patterns.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
